channel.title: Godsword Animations help please :)

item.title: Godsword Animations help please :)
item.dc:creator: @bmwmatt bmwmatt
item.description:
@bmwmatt wrote:

Ok, I’ve added Godswords to my server (valourscape). I have found bits of code in client.java that seem like the right thing to edit:

public int GetStandAnim(int id)
{
if(id == 837)
{
return 2257;

Is this the right thing for the standing animation? Because I have a file in my config folder called weaponhandler which has a list of weapons with their different animations. Can someone please tell me what file I’m editing to get the GS animations into the game?

Thanks,

Bmwmatt

Read full topic
